bibl.title: The Acta Pauli: A New Fragment.
bibl.note: Identifies P. Mich. Inv. 3788 [ed.: H.A. Sanders, HThR 1943] tentatively identified by C.H. Roberts (JThS 47, 1946, pp. 56-57) as a fragment of an uncanonical Gospel, as really from the Acta Pauli. - van Haelst 608.
bibl.seg: Kilpatrick G.D. and C.H. Roberts, The Acta Pauli: A New Fragment.

Identifies P. Mich. Inv. 3788 [ed.: H.A. Sanders, HThR 1943] tentatively identified by C.H. Roberts (JThS 47, 1946, pp. 56-57) as a fragment of an uncanonical Gospel, as really from the Acta Pauli. - van Haelst 608.
